00087   public static function generate( $hashLength = 20, $hashType = self::ALL )
00088   {
00089     //  If we ain't got what you're looking for, return simple md5 hash...
00090     if ( ! isset( self::$_hashSeeds, self::$_hashSeeds[$hashType] ) || ! is_array( self::$_hashSeeds[$hashType] ) )
00091       return md5( time() . time() );
00092 
00093     //  Randomly pick elements from the array of seeds
00094     for ( $_i = 0, $_hash = null, $_size = count( self::$_hashSeeds[$hashType] ) - 1; $_i < $hashLength; $_i++ )
00095       $_hash .= self::$_hashSeeds[$hashType][mt_rand( 0, $_size )];
00096 
00097     return $_hash;
00098   }
00099 
00109   public static function hash( $hashTarget = null, $hashType = self::SHA1, $hashLength = 32, $rawOutput = false )
00110   {
00111     $_value = ( null === $hashTarget ) ? self::generate( $hashLength ) : $hashTarget;
00112 
00113     switch ( $hashType )
00114     {
00115       case self::MD5:
00116         $_hash = md5( $_value, $rawOutput );
00117         break;
00118 
00119       case self::SHA1:
00120         $_hash = sha1( $_value, $rawOutput );
00121         break;
00122 
00123       case self::CRC32:
00124         $_hash = crc32( $_value );
00125         break;
00126 
00127       default:
00128         $_hash = hash( $hashType, $_value, $rawOutput );
00129         break;
00130     }
00131 
00132     return $_hash;
00133   }
